original_text: ‘I was staying in a house in the city of Joppa. One day, when I was praying, I had a special dream. In this vision, I saw something that came down from heaven. It was like a large piece of cloth. Somebody held it at each of its four corners and let it come down to the ground next to me.
korean_text: 이르되 내가 욥바 시에서 기도할 때에 황홀한 중에 환상을 보니 큰 보자기 같은 그릇이 네 귀에 매어 하늘로부터 내리어 내 앞에까지 드리워지거늘

sentences.original_text: I was staying in a house in the city of Joppa.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 욥바 시의 한 집에서 머물고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: One day, when I was praying,
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 내가 기도하고 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: I saw something that came down from heaven.
It was like a large piece of cloth.
Somebody held it at each of its four corners
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람이 그것의 네 모서리를 잡고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and let it come down to the ground next to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것이 내 옆 땅으로 내려오게 했습니다.
